ajuda.name: help
ajuda.description: Sends the list of commands or show info of a command

texts.err_nf_desc:
Command `{cmd}` wasn't found!
 Please check for typos, if you passed the root command or if the command really exists.
texts.cmds_emb_desc: Note: Optional arguments are skipped to the next argument, for example, if you type `{prefix}clear @{author} 5`, with the mention or not, Will delete 5 messages.

botstats.name: botstats
botstats.description: Shows technical information about the bot.

texts.emb_desc: Hi, {author_name}. Here's some information about me.

version.name: version
version.description: Shows the info about current version.

texts.emb_desc: Some info about my version, and the actual commit.

source.name: source
source.description: Shows the source of a command/event.

texts.err_nf_desc:
The command or event that you wrote, doesn't exist.
Check for typos or if what you're searching really exists.

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: Returns your avatar or of a member.

texts.date_value:
**That created the account:** {created_at} ({rel_created})
**That joined in the server:** {joined_at} ({rel_joined})
texts.emb_perms: This member has the following permissions:

oldmembers.name: oldmembers
oldmembers.description: Shows the oldest members in the server.

limpar.name: clear
limpar.description: Clear `x` messages of the channel or of a member. [Manage Messages]

texts.err_or_desc: You wrote a very {high_low} number, use numbers between 2 and 500!

banir.name: ban
banir.description: Bans a member, in the server or not. [Ban Members]

texts.np_ath_lower: You don't have permission to ban **{member_name}**! (Your role is lower or equal to his)
texts.np_bot_lower: I don't have permission to ban **{member_name}**! (My role is lower or equal to his)
texts.invalid_desc: The "id" that you wrote isn't a number!
texts.notfound_value:
The id that you wrote ({id}) don't belong to an member.
Check for typos.

softban.name: softban
softban.description: Ban and unban a member, useful for instantly clear the member messages. [Ban Members]

kickar.name: kick
kickar.description: Kicks a member from the server. [Kick Members]

texts.np_ath_lower: You don't have permission to kick **{member_name}**! (Your role is lower or equal to him)
texts.np_bot_lower: I don't have permission to kick **{member_name}**! (My role is lower or equal to him)

lock.name: lock
lock.description: Locks or unlocks the members of speaking in the channel. [Manage Channels]

texts.emb_desc: The channel is now {un}locked to the role `{role}`.

allow.name: allow
allow.description: Allow an user to see a blocked channel. [Manage Channels]

texts.err_perm:
This member has the `manage channels` permission or the channel isn't blocked.
If nothing applies, means the he has an role with permission.
texts.emb_desc: Now {member_mention} can{no} see messages in this channel.

embed.name: embed
embed.description:
Sends an embed in the channel. [Manage Messages]
Generate the json here: https://discord.club/embedg/

__PS__: Any invalid value is gonna be ignored.

votar.name: vote
votar.description: Makes an survey in the channel. [Manage Messages]

ascii.name: ascii
ascii.description:
Sends an ascii text provided by figlet
Fonts found in: http://www.figlet.org/examples.html

texts.invalid_desc:
The font that you requested doesn't exists.
Fonts found in: http://www.figlet.org/examples.html
texts.big_desc: The text that you requested is so big to be converted to ascii.

qrcode.name: qrcode
qrcode.description:
Generates a qrcode
If the text starts with `read`, put all between quotes.

texts.invalid_desc: This image can't be downloaded or readed.
texts.title: QR Code | Read

texts.error: An error occurred generating the imagem, check the text that you used.
texts.title: Barcode

skin.name: skin
skin.description: Shows the skin from a minecraft player.

github.name: github
github.description: Shows informations about an user from github.

texts.err_401:
The github token is wrong!
Contact a developer.
texts.notfound_desc:
The user that you informed, was not found.
Check if the name corresponds to the used in the github link.
texts.follow_desc:
This user is followed by {followers} users
And follow {following} users.

texts.perm_inv: The permission that you typed was invalid, using 8.

texts.desc_intro: Hi! I'm **Sora**, a bot made to learning, but mainly to help other members of discord!
texts.desc_creation:
I was created in the language python and i'm born in Brazil! I've had several brothers too (all python), that, unfortunately, died :( 
***R.I.P Awme***
texts.desc_grow:
I pretend to be big someday ~~with at least 100 guilds~~.
But, i'll not let my owner get discouraged!
texts.desc_love: I've a lot of lov to my {members} users! :blue_heart: (mainly you, that is reading this <3)
texts.ch_lang:
Você pode alterar ela digitando:
`{prefix}config lang [linguagem]`
texts.desc_prefix: My prefix in this server is: `{prefix}`

texts.error: Wasn't possible to change the language.
